recipesJson.name: Layerz - Mixed Berry Jam
recipesJson.author: thefogvlog
recipesJson.description:
This is not a complete recipe, its a Mixed Berry Jam layer that would work well on top of a cheesecake, ice cream or a crunchy toast layer - it will also work as a jammy filling inside a bakery. 

Black Berries / Blueberries with a hit of Strawberry. Its super gooey and sticky - with a nice round mouthfeel. Not overly sweet - but somewhat sweetish. Hope you guys enjoy. 

We talked about FLV Berry Bend in a live show - https://youtu.be/BYKq4D3Fh6o

EDIT - @Tam Vapes suggested 0.25% FLV Boysenberry to deepen this jam, and it worked.

reviews.text: Excellent Layer.  First time I have used FLV Berry Blend.  Thank you for the video talking about it.  I have a plan for this Jam.  :)
